title: My Ex's Baby
description: Okay, so he wasn’t actually my ex. August is my best friend’s older brother, and he just went with me to Macy and Gideon’s wedding. You know, friends with no benefits.Then we ended up having sex at said wedding.At the reception, not during the actual ceremony. Hello, I have some manners.We agreed to not do it again. Until I thought I was pregnant. And instead of being upset, I was happy.Except I wasn’t. Pregnant, that is. Then I drunk dialed August and asked him to make a baby with me.On purpose.I wanted to take it back. To die of shame.But the next thing I knew, he was at my door...Author’s note: The hero doesn't start out as a single father, but practice makes perfect. My Ex’s Baby is a standalone romantic comedy with a HEA ending and no cliffhanger.
author: Taryn Quinn
